wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Sanasy (born 2 November 1984) is an English former professional footballer who played as a striker.

response: Born in Keighley, Forrest began his career at Bradford City, where he was described as a "promising striker." He joined the club at the age of 9 during the same week as Kevin Sanasy. He made 50 appearances in the Football League for Bradford City, including scoring on his Football League debut.
